line1.text: Roy: Who was John Tucker? He was the greatest explorer around, always searching for the next adventure.

line2.text: Roy: He was also my Dad...

line1.text: Roy: When he wasn't out traveling the world, he was with us.

line2.text: Roy: Each time he returned with a new story, and it inspired us all of us to strive and be like him.

line1.text: Roy: So when he didn't come back home from his last adventure, it devastated us.

line2.text: Roy: No one could find him, and after many search parties came back empty handed, he was officially declared lost... It was a nightmare we thought could never happen to him.

line3.text: Roy: Mom did her best to help us all, even when we didn't know what the future held.

line4.text: Roy: But after hearing her cry for countless nights, we decided it was up to us to find Dad and bring him back.
